headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Bans Sale of Many Antibacterial Soaps, Saying Peril Is Too Great
headline.main: F.D.A. Bans Sale of Many Antibacterial Soaps, Saying Risks Outweigh Benefits

snippet: The agency said manufacturers had failed to prove the products were safe to use over the long term or more effective than using ordinary soap and water....
abstract: Food and Drug Administration issues ban on sale of soaps containing specific antibacterial chemicals, noting industry has not proved chemicals are safe for use over long term; about 40 percent of antibacterial soaps on market contain 19 chemicals identified as potentially dangerous; agency also says such products have not been proven to be more effective than use of ordinary soap and water.
